availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James F. Neal (Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret Jane Brown Neal in Ohio County, Kentucky, on March 20, 1856. Father of Virginia C. Neal, Mary C. Neal, Lawrence Neal, and John M. E. H. Neal. Farmer in Ohio County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, Oakford, p. 249A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Ohio County, KY, July 1863, p. 421.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Ohio County Marriages, Film #000494956, p. 176.
